goal: The purpose of Planet Williams is to make a list of all the associations related to Williams Syndrome.
built by: Built by @aymerick, father of a little boy with Williams Syndrome.
social: Join us on Facebook, Twitter and Google+.
contact: If you want your association to be added to the list, please send me an email at contact@planet-williams.org.
source code: Source code of that website is available on github.
